issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Use "pub use" to expose a clean public API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9757](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9757). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should use "pub use" to expose a clean public API for the structs and traits that users will typically interact with, such as ExecutionContext, DataFrame, and functions for creating logical expressions.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9757?focusedCommentId=17178696) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7978
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7978>
